channel.title: Online Dec 14-Runescape Classic private server-slayer,pking, runecraft, DMarena
channel.description:
[img]http://s30.postimg.org/8t7qif99t/banner2.png[/img] [b]YOU HAVE COME TO THE RIGHT SPOT. 50x Experience Rates +70x for combat stats in the wilderness *Mac user friendly*
[b][url=http://rscslay.com]RSCSlay World Forums[/url][/b] [url=http://rscslay.com/forum/viewtopic.php?pid=1152#p1152]Click here for some pics of RSCSlay[/url]
[img]http://s12.postimg.org/jng630nwd/screenshot22.png[/img]
Master Fisher gives [b]FREE Tuna. 99 max stat Death Match Arena. Dragon 2 handed Sword, dragon chain mail, and dragon plate legs. Slayer. Ability to buy items only by doing slayer. ie Amulet of Rage. Runecrafting. Pking. deposit/withdrawl X option for banking system. [img]http://s13.postimg.org/9b7skzxhz/screenshot17.png[/img] [img]http://s13.postimg.org/o8g9m0aqf/screenshot19.png[/img]
Try your shot to get a SLAY PKER AXE from chronozon the blood demon. [img]http://s22.postimg.org/706i7bwnl/screenshot8.png[/img]
[b]Introducing Zerdoga! (level 1360)[/b] [img]http://s10.postimg.org/jeue22wex/screenshot5.png[/img] **Edgeville shop sells gauntlets, strength potions,Super potion sets, Prayer potions, and ammys.**[/b] Pure Pk Square-- 1-10 def pures only.(boxed off area in the wilderness to have low level wars)
[b]Commands[/b] ::dm1, 2, 3 ,4. ( takes you and another to death match to 1 v 1) [b]::varrock (tellys you by bank on edge of varrock wild)[/b] [b]::edge (tellys you on the road by edgeville wild)[/b] [b]::dragons (tellys you to dragons in the wilderness)[/b] ::skull (will skull your character for a set amount of time) ::online (shows a list of the players online, it can also be seen on the Homepage) ::fatigue (sets your fatigue to 100%, so you don't earn unwanted experience) ::say (to talk globally with everyone in the world) [b] ::wildy ( see whos in the wild)[/b] [b]The Website[/b] [url=http://rscslay.com]Click here to go to website[/url] Client download is on the homepage -> Left hand side. Any problems? There is a guide there as well.
Crazy Lotterys. [img]http://s27.postimg.org/ocxypw91f/screenshot17.png[/img] [b]make money[/b] New players first starting out in Edgeville. There is a nice area where you can immediately start mining or fishing to make money. If this skilling is not your cup of tea then go to ::varrock and get a slayer task. The monsters in edgeville drops decent to get you started out fast. chickens drops coins, 9 man drops up to addy 2h, full iron, decent coins. 31 Skellys drop decent stuff and coins, Guards drop decent coins and random ruby ammys. Once you feel confident then you can venture in the wilderness where you will get quadruple the exp rates for combat stats. Also, the monsters in the wilderness drop good stuff. 13 alter is filled with lesser demons and outside is a couple of greaters.. dropping decents cash and up to rune b axes, and r2h's. ::Dragons range them and loot. Black Demons drop rune armours and wepons, coins, bloods, deaths and they are found in the wilderness north of the castle inside of the bandit camp.... if you dont want to walk then simply use the portal in edgeville to get there. LAVA maze is the prime location where there is green dragons that drop cash bloods and rune weapons. at the end of the maze there is a ladder to get to the only king black dragon in the game. RSCSlay -stEps

item.title: Online Dec 14-Runescape Classic private server-slayer,pking, runecraft, DMarena
item.dc:creator: @stEps stEps
item.description:
@stEps wrote:

Slayer Pkers,
Death Match Arena is now here! Players now have the ability to lock in a match and fight till the death!
Be sure to take pictures and safe your proof of kills on the forums in the pking board.
You will need to use the portal to get to the arena hallway, It is safe in here and you won’t be able to be attacked.

See these commands to get into a death match box.

Slayer:
To begin leveling your slayer skill you can walk to varrock(by the wilderness) or use the command ::varrock. Once you reach level 50 slayer Each task will give death runes, and slayer orbs while you complete it.
Slayer Masters:
Ogre Shaman(slayer level 1-49) will assign you tasks.
Ogre guard(slayer level 50-79) will assign you tasks.
Skavid(slayer level 80-99) will assign you tasks.


Coming soon: You will be able to cert slayer orbs and buy things with these certs. RuneCrafting skill will give you the ability to mine Rune essence, cert them if desired, and use these essence to make your own runes!

EDIT: Big update coming 8/25/15 will post about it on forums.
Edit on 8/27:
Runecrafting is now fully functional for everyone who wants to master it making their own runes. See forums under Guide section for more info.

Also, The first Slayer item is now for sale for 500 slayer orbs- Amulet of Rage!

Other stuff added:
Candy Cane

All the best here on Slaypk RSC

Read full topic
item.source: Online Dec 14-Runescape Classic private server-slayer,pking, runecraft, DMarena

item.title: Online Dec 14-Runescape Classic private server-slayer,pking, runecraft, DMarena
item.dc:creator: @aurora87 aurora87
item.description:
@aurora87 wrote:

Exp rates aren’t much faster than any replica, no players online, drop rates completely suck, feels grindy as hell for a “PK SERVER”, looks like shit, first impressions are fudging terrible, forum is ugly as shit, looks like a 5 year old drew it then threw up on it then shit on it. Who ever the admin is he needs to throw himself off an extremely tall building or just suck his finger and push it into a live socket.

Don’t waste your time on this garbage, go waste your life on the other shitty servers online, at least people play those…

Read full topic
item.source: Online Dec 14-Runescape Classic private server-slayer,pking, runecraft, DMarena

item.title: Online Dec 14-Runescape Classic private server-slayer,pking, runecraft, DMarena
item.dc:creator: @stEps stEps
item.description:
@stEps wrote:

SlayPkers,

Im glad to announce that we have a new client for the game. To download this new client just click on client download at the top of the site.

Some new things for the game are Slayer and Runecrafting skills.(runecrafting will be put in at a later date and slayer is in its beginning stages).

A couple of other things added were being able to see your exact combat level in the stat menu.
Also, banking has gotten a bit more convenient. There is now a withdrawl and deposit X in your bank accounts!

Alot more plans for the Future of Slaypk -RSC !

Hope you guys like these updates and continue to voice your opinions, because that is what makes our server the best!

Read full topic
item.source: Online Dec 14-Runescape Classic private server-slayer,pking, runecraft, DMarena

Im back around for a bit, so people come play if you like too… The server has been online for over 9 months now[/quote]

exactly, but you banned my ip, so it has an error when i try to download the client, if you would lift your finger to un-ban my ip, you wouldn’t have to make an external link for the client. either way, this server doesn’t look to new or interesting, peace out. ;D

item.title: Online Dec 14-Runescape Classic private server-slayer,pking, runecraft, DMarena
item.dc:creator: @slaveofmen slaveofmen
item.description:
@slaveofmen wrote:

[quote=“matty matt, post:64, topic:544866”]Just sent out some advertisements and it is bringing in some new players. The server is rich it just needs more and more players.

@slaveofmen Everything was addressed in a timely manner and all things will be dealt with if it is something that is the best for the server. ex. if one person wants to be able to buy law runes from a store for 500gp then most likely it is not going to be implemented because it is not whats best for the server.

F2p wild is now active. Commands ::dragons, ::castle, ::Varrock, ::dm.[/quote]

i only say that stEps doesn’t help someone with a single problem. i quit this server a while back, and then stEps banned my ip. i got into a vpn, and registered again, and told stEps id come back. he was fine with that, and let me join. i later tried to download the client, but there was an error since my ip was banned and i was in a vpn. i told this to stEps, and pretty much told me to “just figure it out” when he had the banning and unbanning options right in his hands. this wouldn’t have been a big deal if he would have just given me an external link to the client, but stEps can hardly lift a finger when it comes to a single player’s problem. i am no longer interested in this server, so yeah…

chow.

Read full topic

item.title: Online Dec 14-Runescape Classic private server-slayer,pking, runecraft, DMarena
item.dc:creator: @stEps stEps
item.description:
@stEps wrote:

hello everyone I would like to see this server do well as I know many others feel the same.

Problem: We have 2 servers that replicate what RSC used to be.

Solution: We have slaypk where we have higher experience rates, better drop rates, commands to get around the world, bosses, centralized edgeville for skillers.

 problem with this solution: Slaypk needs some organization and structure.

This is what I believe we need to rebuild our community and make this server that everyone wants to be successful.

1: Steady events leading to the need for a EVENT MOD or 2.
2: implement some ideas that new comers may have to better the server.
3: Having everyone that plays voice their opinions and be a part of the way the server develops.

Discuss what you think.

  • many people say there is a boat load of people just waiting for a pk server, yet I do not see them here pking when the server is righteous.
    with this said some people think the server is going to be wiped, but the reality is that it has been online for over 7 months now without that nor is it going to happen.

If your serious about being a part of developing a server with pking then discuss what you like and dislike and we can move forward together as a community to get to where we need to be.

Read full topic
item.source: Online Dec 14-Runescape Classic private server-slayer,pking, runecraft, DMarena

@pointofit wrote:

Play this server, U my be able to find 2 ppl on per day! was 3 but whats the point playing when he will wipe it eventually, Its the same guy who mad classickillz, And a few other servers that all died with 1 or 2 players on, I know it aint his fault as rsc scene has been dead for some time now, I tied the server out for aound a week, Maybee 5 players on threw hat whole time, 1 person alone has every item in the game, Go in wildy u will get maybe 3 kills, Will be the same person u kill everytime… I for 1 will not be going back,

Sorry Matty Matt But has to be said…

Edit - Also on home page it says 20 odd ppl online… Wer are these 20 odd ppl? lol

item.title: Online Dec 14-Runescape Classic private server-slayer,pking, runecraft, DMarena
item.dc:creator: @stEps stEps
item.description:
@stEps wrote:

Hello Everyone,

For all the people that had doubts of this server going offline, it has now been proven that this is not the case.
This server has been online now for well over 6 months and I wanted to prove that it will stay online.

With that said it has been a long time since we have did a double experience weekend, so it is now activated from March 21st-23rd.
Also, when the player count is right there will be Capture the Flag and other random events to keep it entertaining.

This would be a great time for people who have not tried the server or the ones who have and are looking to gain some
levels in skills with a bit of an incentive! Inside the Wilderness you will gain the fastest experience for melee stats.

  • lets make slay the place to pk runescape classic style

Read full topic

item.source: Online Dec 14-Runescape Classic private server-slayer,pking, runecraft, DMarena

item.title: Online Dec 14-Runescape Classic private server-slayer,pking, runecraft, DMarena
item.dc:creator: @stEps stEps
item.description:
@stEps wrote:

After some serious thought about few changes made I’ve reverted back with some alterations.

Super potions sets along with Prayer potions are back in Edgeville general store.(players liked the idea of being able to get these at any point in time, so they could go BOSS).

Rune 2hander is sold in edgeville 2 handed sword shop.

Rune Armour shop on the edgeville strip next to the stone head.(players liked ability to buy rune exactly when needed).

I like to listen to the players of the server with keeping in mind what will be best for the future of slaypk rsc. Be glade to see everyone on pking and having fun vs no lifeing on a slow exp rate server that is trying to replicate what they did not make in the first place.
We are all older now and majority are into pking and staking along with some skilling, but we don’t wanna have to do a skill for a dam year to get the ability to make something lol.

I would like to start running more capture the flag events, which are decently fun if we can get decent team numbers. Along with some other events to put a few more rares that are not in the game currently into circulation.

Come try us out and become an active member not only in the game, but on the forums aswell. We are built on community over here at slaypk rsc and that is what will keep us alive for a while to come.

Read full topic
item.source: Online Dec 14-Runescape Classic private server-slayer,pking, runecraft, DMarena

item.title: Online Dec 14-Runescape Classic private server-slayer,pking, runecraft, DMarena
item.dc:creator: @stEps stEps
item.description:
@stEps wrote:

Attention all Slay RSCers!!!

I’m happy to announce that there is a new boss in the game. Also, some monsters are smarter!
Try your shot at this badass new boss that will drop 4 new rares into the game. Also, will drop and add Dragon plate legs into the game. (there will be a topic for players to make drop guide).
Introducing Zerdoga! (level 1360)

More stuff that will be put into the update log on the forum.

More Importantly this weekend Friday - Sunday there will be Double Experience for Everyone to get stats you have been working for or for the new players to get the JUMP START!.

Events will be run aswell.

-stEps
